title: Tamora is similarly without resources and supporters when she enters Rome. However, members of her own family and retinue (Aaron) accompany her, so she is not initially quite as isolated as Margaret is; when she abruptly becomes empress, there is little indication that she suffers from limited resources or respect until her affair with Aaron is revealed.
